name: Greco Kara no Chousenjou! Keisan no Yakata to Obake-Tachi: Hiki-San
name_original: Greco Kara no Chousenjou! Keisan no Yakata to Obake-Tachi: Hiki-San
description:
Greco Kara no Chousenjou! Keisan no Yakata to Obake-Tachi: Hiki-San is an educational game developed by Media5. It was originally released in 2013. media5 published the game.
Greco Kara no Chousenjou! Keisan no Yakata to Obake-Tachi: Hiki-San is available on Nintendo 3DS.
